mute.false: Mute disabled. Bot will send messages.

atUsername.true: Usernames will be shown with @ like @foo
atUsername.false: Usernames will be shown without @ like foo

raffle.announceInterval: Opened raffles will be announced every (value) minute
raffle.announceCustomMessage: Raffle custom announce message set to `(value)`
raffle.minWatchedTime: and you need to have at least (time) watched hours to parcitipate

participation.success: You just entered in current raffle! Good luck!
participation.failed: Sorry, you are not eligible to enter the raffle! If you want to know conditions to enter, whisper me !raffle

opened.everyone: (sender), raffle is opened. To enter type !(keyword). Everyone can participate
opened.everyoneAndProduct: (sender), raffle is opened for `(product)`. To enter type !(keyword). Everyone can participate
opened.followers: (sender), raffle is opened. To enter type !(keyword). Only followers can participate
opened.followersAndProduct: (sender), raffle is opened for `(product)`. To enter type !(keyword). Only followers can participate
opened.subscribers: (sender), raffle is opened. To enter type !(keyword). Only subscribers can participate
opened.subscribersAndProduct: (sender), raffle is opened for `(product)`. To enter type !(keyword). Only subscribers can participate
opened.everyoneTickets: (sender), ticket raffle is opened. To enter type !(keyword) <(min)-(max)>. Everyone can participate
opened.everyoneAndProductTickets: (sender), ticket raffle is opened for `(product)`. To enter type !(keyword) <(min)-(max)>. Everyone can participate
opened.followersTickets: (sender), ticket raffle is opened. To enter type !(keyword) <(min)-(max)>. Only followers can participate
opened.followersAndProductTickets: (sender), ticket raffle is opened for `(product)`. To enter type !(keyword) <(min)-(max)>. Only followers can participate
opened.subscribersTickets: (sender), ticket raffle is opened. To enter type !(keyword) <(min)-(max)>. Only subscribers can participate
opened.subscribersAndProductTickets: (sender), ticket raffle is opened for `(product)`. To enter type !(keyword) <(min)-(max)>. Only subscribers can participate

info.closed: (sender) Raffle is closed, but winner is not picked yet!

open.error: (sender) Raffle was not opened! Use: !raffle open [raffle-keyword] [product(optional)] [time=#(optional)] [followers(optional)]
open.running: (sender) Raffle is already running! Keyword for raffle is !(keyword)
open.locked: (sender) Raffle is closed! Choose winner with !raffle pick

ok.everyone: New raffle is opened. To enter type !(keyword). Everyone can participate
ok.everyoneAndProduct: New raffle is opened for `(product)`. To enter type !(keyword). Everyone can participate
ok.followers: New raffle is opened. To enter type !(keyword). Only followers can participate

ok.subscribers: New raffle is opened. To enter type !(keyword). Only subscribers can participate

ok.followersTickets: New ticket raffle is opened. To enter type !(keyword) <(min)-(max)>. Only followers can participate

ok.subscribersTickets: New ticket raffle is opened. To enter type !(keyword) <(min)-(max)>. Only subscribers can participate
ok.subscribersAndProductTickets: New ticket raffle is opened for `(product)`. To enter type !(keyword) <(min)-(max)>. Only subscribers can participate

notice.everyoneAndProduct: Raffle is currently running for `(product)`. To enter type !(keyword). Everyone can participate
notice.followers: Raffle is currently running. To enter type !(keyword). Only followers can participate
notice.followersAndProduct: Raffle is currently running for `(product)`. To enter type !(keyword). Only followers can participate
notice.subscribers: Raffle is currently running. To enter type !(keyword). Only subscribers can participate

close.ok: Current raffle was closed! You cannot participate anymore!

winner.withoutProduct: Congratulations @(winner), you just won a raffle! Win probability was (probability)%
winner.withProduct: Congratulations @(winner), you just won a raffle for `(product)`! Win probability was (probability)%

pick.noParticipants: There were no participants in this raffle! No winner selected.

bets.newBet: (sender), your current bet is (amount) (pointsName) on (option). You can win (winAmount) (winPointsName)!
bets.running: (sender), bet is already opened! Use !bet close [(options)]
bets.notRunning: No bet is currently opened, ask mods to open it!
bets.opened: New bet is opened! Use !bet [(options)] [points] to win! You have only (minutes)min to bet!
bets.notEnoughOptions: (sender), new bets needs at least 2 options!
bets.info: Bets are opened! Use !bet [(options)] [points] to win! (time)min left to bet!
bets.diffBet: (sender), you already made a bet on (option) and you cannot bet to different option!
bets.notEnoughPoints: Sorry, (sender), but you dont have (amount) (pointsName) to bet!
bets.undefinedBet: Sorry, (sender), but this bet option doesn't exist, use !bet to check usage
bets.betPercentGain: Bet percent gain per option was set to (value)%
bets.betCloseTimer: Bets will be automatically closed after (value)min
bets.refund: Bets were closed without a winning. All users are refunded!
bets.notOption: (sender), this option doesn't exist! Bet is not closed, check !bet
bets.closed: Bets was closed and winning option was (option)! (amount) users won!
bets.timeUpBet: I guess you are too late, (sender), your time for betting is up!
bets.locked: Betting time is up! No more bets.
bets.lockedInfo: Bets are opened, but time for betting is up!
bets.removed: Betting time is up! No bets were sent -> automatically closing
